resources.string: Voice recognition is not available at the moment.
Enter search query or Tap on mic for voice input.
Unable to retrieve data.\nPlease try again later.
Designed and Developed by Sumit\nLanguage processing by WolframAlpha API\nImage search by Microsoft Cognitive API

To get information on anything enter your search query in the search bar. You can also use voice input to enter query.\n\nTap on menu and select \"Recognize Photo\" to take a photo and get description.
Please check your network connectivity and try again.
